text: yud'dha (tantra) ttinayi sthanam marunnatinea (svantam) sanghatteateappam cerunnatinea allate ann avaril ninnu (satrukkalute mumpil ninn‌) vallavanum pintirinn kalayunna paksam avan allahuvilninnulla keapattinu patramayirikkunnatum avanre sanketam narakamayirikkunnatuman‌. cennuceran keallarutatta sthalamatre at‌
